Special Flag Cap
ObjectDescription
A Special Flag Hat which can only be purchased at the shop. Wow your friends with this cool looking fashion accessory! [#Legal]
Un Chapeau Drapeau spécial pouvant uniquement être acheté dans la boutique. Épatez vos amis avec ce nouvel accessoire de mode très classe ! [#Legal]
Ein Spezialflaggen-Hut, der nur im Shop erhältlich ist. Beeindrucken Sie Ihre Freunde mit diesem super gut aussehenden Modeaccessoire! [#Legal]
Un Cappello Bandiera Speciale che può essere acquistato solo al negozio. Sbalordisci i tuoi amici con questo fantastico accessorio di moda! [#Legal]
Sombrero Bandera Especial que solo puede comprarse en la tienda. ¡Alucina a tus amigos con este accesorio tan guay! [#Legal]
ショップ限定スペシャルフラッグ帽子です。注目されること間違いなし！[#Legal]
샵 한정 판매 특별한 깃발모자입니다. 이목을 집중시키기 딱이죠! [#Legal]
A Special Flag Hat which can only be purchased at the shop. Wow your friends with this cool looking fashion accessory! [#Legal]
本店限定的特製便帽。戴上後必定吸引眾人的目光！[#Legal]
本店限定的特製便帽。戴上後必定吸引眾人的目光！[#Legal]

A cut above the regular yellow flag, the Special Flag was the hard-earned secret bonus for classic Namco gamers around the world! Now you can take a walk down memory lane, and show off your gaming prowess with this quirky cap that tells the world just how much of a hardcore gamer you are![#Legal]
